faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Renting a House in Sector 21 Rohtak

faqs.question: What is the typical security deposit required for a House For Rent in Sector 21 Rohtak
faqs.answer: The standard security deposit in Sector 21 usually ranges from one to three months' rent depending on the property type the landlord's policy and whether the house is furnished or unfurnished. For highly sought-after properties or premium Kothis a three-month deposit is common. This amount is refundable at the end of the tenancy subject to a satisfactory property inspection for damages beyond normal wear and tear. Always clarify the exact deposit amount and the terms of its refund with the landlord or our representative before signing the lease agreement.

faqs.question: Are maintenance charges included in the rent for properties in Sector 21
faqs.answer: It depends entirely on the specific House For Rent and the type of building. For independent houses maintenance charges usually cover municipal taxes and basic utilities and these are typically borne by the tenant outside the rent. However in properties that are part of a larger gated colony or society a monthly maintenance fee covering common area electricity security and lift services may be charged either included in the rent or paid separately by the tenant. Our listings clearly specify if maintenance is included or an additional cost.

faqs.question: What is the standard lock-in period for rental agreements in Sector 21 Rohtak
faqs.answer: Most residential rentals in Sector 21 operate on an 11-month lease agreement which can be renewed. The standard lock-in period is generally six months. A lock-in period means that neither the tenant nor the landlord can terminate the agreement before this period ends without incurring a penalty typically equivalent to one or two months' rent. We advise tenants seeking flexibility to discuss and agree upon a shorter lock-in period before finalising the rental terms.

faqs.answer: Sector 21 is considered a prime residential area in Rohtak offering exceptional connectivity.
